tool.name: Remove.otus
tool.description: Remove otus containing sequences from specified groups
tool.command:
echo 'remove.otus( list=$otu, label=$label, group=$group_in #if $groups: ,groups=${ str($groups).replace(",","-") } #end if )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$otu" && prefix2="$group_in" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.pick.* "$list_out" && mv \${prefix2%.dat}*.pick.* "$group_out" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile"

param.name: groups
param.label: groups - Pick groups to remove
param.help: At least one group must be selected

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The remove.otus_ command removes otus from a list_ containing sequences from a specific group or set of groups.
.. _list: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _remove.otus: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Remove.otus
